channel.title: Quality of Life on 4wayhandshake
channel.description: Recent content in Quality of Life on 4wayhandshake

item.title: Pretty Terminal
item.description: WHY Because things are faster when they look the way you expect ’em to. It’s great when things look nice, but having a pretty terminal is just as much about functionality as it is about aesthetics. I just installed a new ParrotOS system and I don’t enjoy the default bash terminal they provide. Let’s add in some much-needed quality of life improvements! ![default bash with normal colors](default bash with normal colors.
